name: Cyber Swing
description:
In a post-apocalyptic world, we visit the life of a cyber kangaroo desperate to reach the charging station before the batteries run out.

Gameplay

Feel every move your Cyber Kangaroo does! As Cyber Swing, we offer most realistic arcade experience.

How to play

Use your magnetic lasso to jump to platforms; avoid magnetic traps and jump as high as you can to recharge your cyber kangaroo!

Use A, D and space to move around. Your left mouse button can be used to use the magnet and the right mouse button can be used to switch the magnets polarity.

Game rules

There are 3 different kinds of trap and you have to avoid all of them: Magnetic trap - Electric trap - Hidden turret!
